== Install, Upgrade, Changelog ==

Follow our guide to [InstallationOpenMeetings install OpenMeetings], or to [UpdateOpenMeetings upgrade OpenMeetings], we publish our latest changes in the [ChangeLog  Changelog].

Need for a developer or Consultant? [http://code.google.com/p/openmeetings/wiki/Jobs Hire a Developer]

If you would like to request a new feature please use the [http://groups.google.com/d/forum/openmeetings-user mailing list/forums]

== !OpenMeetings Demo Videos ==
